subject: Golf
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The first stick that Finau learned to maneuver was not a golf club but one with knives on either end that is used in a warrior dance in Samoa, where his ancestors are from.
snippet: The first stick that Finau learned to maneuver was not a golf club but one with knives on either end that is used in a warrior dance in Samoa, where his ancestors are from.
